titles.title: A bill to renew the temporary suspension of duty on vulcanized rubber felt-bottom boots for actual use in fishing waders.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 5/8/2012--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on vulcanized rubber felt-bottom boots for actual use in fishing waders.
